{{Wireless embedded system |brand=TP-LINK |model=TL-WPA8630 |revision=P |asin=B01K7IH638 |price=139.99 |fcc_date=11/08/2016 |is_manuf=No |type=Powerline Access Point |fcc_id=TE7WPA8630P |ic_id=8853A-WPA8630P |pwr_v=100-120 |pwr_amp=0.2 |pwr_vac=yes |pwr_ac_hz=50-60 |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |cpu1_model=QCA9563;QCA9563-AL3A, PE65390.K6, 1531, TAIWAN; |cpu2_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |cpu2_model=QCA7500 |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=EtronTech |ram1_model=EM68C16CWQD-25H |ram2=128 |ram2_brand=Samsung |ram2_model=K4B1G1646G-BCH9 |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=QCA9563;QCA9563-AL3A, PE65390.K6, 1531, TAIWAN; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=QCA9882;QCA9882-BR4A, FNSB512.K3, 1536, TAIWAN; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Atheros |eth_chip2_model=AR8035 |sw_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |sw_model=QCA8337;QCA8337-AL3C, PE6F465.K2, 1551, TAIWAN |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=3 |flags=HomePlug AV2, MIMO |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=TP-LINK_XXXX, TP-LINK_XXXX_5G |default_ip=http://tplinkplc.net |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=00:19:E0 }} {{TagLine|AV1200 Gigabit Passthrough Powerline ac Wi-Fi}}
{{ProductPage|http://www.tp-link.com/us/products/details/cat-5509_TL-WPA8630P-KIT.html}} {{SupportPage|vendor=TP-LINK|model=TL-WPA8630P-KIT}} Sold as part of the TP-LINK TL-WPA8630P KIT which includes this TL-WPA8630P and a [[TP-LINK TL-PA8010P]] Web Management: http://tplinkplc.net Datasheet only claims up to 300Mbps for 2.4GHz and the device only contains two antennas for 2.4GHz and two for 5GHz so wi1 is likely limited to two streams in operation despite 3x3:3 support from the QCA9563. Powerline OUI: 00:19:E0
